item.title: Fast help needed
item.dc:creator: @Niv3k Niv3k
item.description:
@Niv3k wrote:

Hello,

I got my server online now … (MTP v2 [PI] i guess)
But do you know how to change the prices of items?
And how do i add overloads?
Oh and… i wont get any xp if im kill monsters/npc how do i fix this?
And how do i add new hp bars because i got this error
